title: #268: The Environmental Justice League
description:
The Biden Administration plans on spending nearly a trillion dollars to “reduce inflation” by printing more money and handing it to their criminal friends like John Podesta to distribute to a shadowy network of grifters in the Climate Change space.

However, it goes much deeper than that as a whole new category of grifting has been developed under the banner of “Environmental Justice” and financed with $60,000,000,000 to get the scam off the ground. The vague promises will be broken as they always are, and the money will flow from the federal government to corrupt committees to powerful people connected to Washington D.C. always under the guise of saving the planet from the horrors of the climate.
